subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Pacers’ top five players lead all N.B.A. starters in time spent on the court together this season, but that appears to be contributing to their mediocre performance as a unit lately.
snippet: The Pacers’ top five players lead all N.B.A. starters in time spent on the court together this season, but that appears to be contributing to their mediocre performance as a unit lately.
